plot: Caught between his brother's past and his child's future, one man's choice triggers catastrophe for his whole family.
title: Though I Know the River Is Dry
plot_es: Caught between his brother's past and his child's future, one man's choice triggers catastrophe for his whole family.
original_name: Though I Know the River Is Dry
plot_en: Caught between his brother's past and his child's future, one man's choice triggers catastrophe for his whole family.
